attributes.action: Talk to leaders of the other 'Euro' states to reduce taxation on vehicle fuels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Brown, please initiate talks with the leaders of the other 'Euro' states to have taxation on vehicle fuels reduced across the whole of Europe. Such a move would leave more money in consumer's pockets (therefore giving us more spending power) and would do a great deal to prevent a Europe-wide recession we seem to be headed towards.
Regards, Mr Del Core
